title: Live Crime Reporting System
description: A real-time, geo-based crime reporting web app designed to empower communities. Users can report crimes instantly, receive alerts within a 1 km radius, and validate incidents collaboratively. Once verified by multiple users, alerts are escalated to the nearest police station for action.

title: eCommerce Website
description: Built a responsive, front-end eCommerce site using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. Features include dynamic product listing, shopping cart functionality, and interactive UI components for a smooth user experience.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Designed and developed a fully responsive personal portfolio using HTML, Vanilla CSS, and JavaScript to showcase my skills, projects, and academic background. Implemented smooth navigation, interactive sections, and a modern UI to reflect my professional identity.

title: Emergency Service
description: This project serves as a practical demonstration of complex DOM manipulation and asynchronous data fetching using vanilla JavaScript. I'm leveraging these skills for transitioning into a Front-End role. Let's connect on LinkedIn to discuss web development or potential opportunities.

title: Green Earth: Dynamic Tree Planting App
description: A responsive web application promoting tree plantation, built with Vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This project demonstrates API integration for fetching detailed plant data, combined with complex DOM manipulation for the core functionality. Users can explore tree categories, view information, and manage items in a dynamic cart with real-time calculations. It features modern UI elements and full mobile responsiveness.

title: Customer Support System
description: A responsive, React-based web application designed to track, manage, and resolve customer support tickets. This project showcases proficiency in state management, conditional rendering, and dynamic UI updates essential for building functional dashboards and administrative interfaces.
